snippet.title: Get ready for 3D-printed pasta, in any shape you want
snippet.description: Mangia! A collaboration between pasta maker Barilla and research organization TNO envisions restaurants where you can 3D-print your own pasta shapes for a custom meal.

snippet.title: Hamilton Beach SaladXpress makes a quick and easy salad
snippet.description: The Hamilton Beach 70950 SaladXpress Food Processor makes it easy to add a variety of different cuts to a vegetable salad. Four different "cutting cones" get the job done.

snippet.title: Play (d'oh) with your pasta
snippet.description: The Viante Pasta Extruder brightens up old-timey classics. The countertop appliance can help prepare up to 14 types of pasta.

snippet.title: Zing your own salad dressing
snippet.description: The Zing Anything Salad Zinger is a salad gadget designed to make it easy to prep your own dressing. The removable base unscrews to unveil a special compartment.

snippet.title: Salad Hands give lettuce an extra kick
snippet.description: The Ergonomic Salad Hands help you get a better grip on your salads, letting you toss and serve with some flair.

snippet.title: Crank out the pasta dough
snippet.description: Featuring hand-cranked operation, the Marcato Pasta Extruder is a kitchen tool that anyone can use. Capable of producing a variety of pastas, the machine offers something for everybody.

snippet.title: Make pasta the easy way
snippet.description: The Automatic Fresh Pasta Maker at Hammacher Schlemmer offers an easy way to make a variety of pasta. The machine kneads, mixes and extrudes, making it easy to enjoy fresh pasta any time.

snippet.title: Social networking's salad days are ending, Forrester says
snippet.description: "We are in a bubble for social startups," Forrester CEO George Colony says. To survive, new apps will have to be fast to use, he predicts.

snippet.title: No more salad dressing aisle
snippet.description: Perfect Mix salad accessories provide exactly the dressing you desire. Either infused oil, or a classic oil and vinegar mix, the distinctive glass bottles allow for complete customization.

snippet.title: The 404 1,056: Where you don't win friends with salad (podcast)
snippet.description: Leaked from today's episode: a new Netflix video player, "30 Rock" enters its last season, a band randomly picks up hitch-hiking John Waters, and how popular is your birthday?
